Posts.Content: Please join us on Tuesday, September 20 from noon to 1:15pm (EDT) for Monitoring for Recurrence and Managing Fears, a FREE teleconference featuring special guest, Carey K. Anders, MD.  During the call, participants will learn skills to cope with fear, explore practical tips to help ease concerns, learn how to create a post-treatment plan with their caregivers and find additional post-treatment resources and support services.
Posts.Title: Living Beyond Breast Cancer: Teleconference

Posts.Content: Join us on Saturday, October 1 for Living Beyond Breast Cancer’s Annual Fall Conference, News You Can Use: Breast Cancer Updates for Living Well. This year’s conference celebrates 20 years of LBBC’s mission to empower all women affected by breast cancer to live as long as possible with the best quality of life. This full-day program will present you with the latest medical and quality-of-life news to help you live well during and after breast cancer. Join us to get informed, get your questions answered and to connect with others. Register today on lbbc.org or by calling 610.645.4567.
